#summary Module "util"

<font color="#dd2255">
== This module is obsolete and no longer present in v8cgi ==
More specifically:
  * `serialize()` and `deserialize()` functions are *already natively supported* by V8, see http://wiki.ecmascript.org/doku.php?id=es3.1:json_support
  * `md5()`, `sha1()`, `base64encode()` and `base64decode()` functions were separated into "base64" and "hash" modules
  * `utf8encode()` and `utf8decode()` are supported by Binary module
  * `mail()` was separated into a "mail" module
</font>
